title: Requirement Analysis
description: The purpose of requirement analysis is to evaluate the feasibility of the Next.js project idea.

title: UI/UX design
description: The goal of the UI/UX design stage is to create an intuitive and engaging user interface based on the requirements analysis.

title: Development and testing
description: In this phase we build a robust and functional application while ensuring its reliability and performance through rigorous testing.

title: Maintenance
description: The maintenance phase ensures the ongoing performance, security, and usability of the application after its initial launch.
